title: Fighting dengue in Colombo: Pilot project with local BTI; Ministry to purchase 400 litres initially:
content: Daily News – By Chaminda Perera The Health Ministry as a pilot project will utilize the much awaited locally produced BTI bacteria in the dengue control campaign in pre-identified locations in the Colombo district this week. The Ministry will purchase 400 litres of BTI bacteria initially and further purchases will be made on the success…
